title: Teapot And Cover, 1984
markings: Inscribed on unglazed underside of base: "Lisbet" in script.
creditline: Gift of Eduardo Garrido and Lisbet Dæhlin
description: Thrown globular body (a), tapered at top and bottom, with small circular base.  Applied short tapered spout and two loops for handle.  Cover (b) with deep flange; porcelain finial held with brass rivet; secured underside with porcelain button.  High curved bamboo handle inserted through ceramic loops at front and back of pot; handle wrapped in pink, yellow, and black fabric (fabric handle designed by Bente Sægtrang, in collaboration with artist).  Exterior body of teapot and cover glazed with flat ash-glazed borax glaze with cobalt to produce deep rich mat blue.  Interior of pot and cover glazed with white gloss.

tombstone.epitaph:
Teapot And Cover, 1984.
1984. Glazed earthenware, bamboo, fabric, metal. Gift of Eduardo Garrido and Lisbet Dæhlin. 1985-5-1-a,b.
